verses.verse: Afterward he <S%H935>brought<s%> me to the <S%H1964>temple<s%>, and <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H352>posts<s%>, <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%> on the one <S%H6311>side<s%>, and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%> on the other <S%H6311>side<s%>, which was the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>.

And the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H6607>door<s%> was <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>; and the <S%H3802>sides<s%> of the <S%H6607>door<s%> were <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> on the one <S%H2568>side<s%>, and five <S%H520>cubits<s%> on the other <S%H4058>side<s%>: and he measured the <S%H753>length<s%> <S%H705>there<s%>, forty <S%H520>cubits<s%>: and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%>, <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>.

Then <S%H935>went<s%> he <S%H6441>inward<s%>, and <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H352>post<s%> of the <S%H6607>door<s%>, <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>; and the <S%H6607>door<s%>, <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>; and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H6607>door<s%>, <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>.

So he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> <S%H6242>there<s%>, twenty <S%H520>cubits<s%>; and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%>, <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1964>temple<s%>: and he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6944>me<s%>, This is the most holy <S%H6944>place<s%>.

After he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H7023>wall<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>; and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of every side <S%H6763>chamber<s%>, <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> on every <S%H5439>side<s%>.

And the <S%H6763>side<s%> <S%H6763>chambers<s%> were <S%H7969>three<s%>, one over <S%H6763>another<s%>, and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> in <S%H6471>order<s%>; and they <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H7023>wall<s%> which was of the <S%H1004>house<s%> for the side <S%H6763>chambers<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, that they might have <S%H270>hold<s%>, but they had not <S%H270>hold<s%> in the <S%H7023>wall<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And there was an <S%H7337>enlarging<s%>, and a winding <S%H5437>about<s%> still <S%H4605>upward<s%> to the side <S%H6763>chambers<s%>: for the winding <S%H4141>about<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> went still <S%H4605>upward<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>: therefore the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> was still <S%H4605>upward<s%>, and so <S%H5927>increased<s%> from the <S%H8481>lowest<s%> chamber to the <S%H5945>highest<s%> by the <S%H8484>midst<s%>.

I <S%H7200>saw<s%> also the <S%H1363>height<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>: the <S%H4328>foundations<s%> of the side <S%H6763>chambers<s%> were a <S%H4393>full<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> of <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H679>great<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>.

The <S%H7341>thickness<s%> of the <S%H7023>wall<s%>, which was for the side <S%H6763>chamber<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%>, was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>: and that which was <S%H3240>left<s%> was the <S%H1004>place<s%> of the side <S%H6763>chambers<s%> that were <S%H1004>inside<s%>.
And between the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> was the <S%H7341>wideness<s%> of <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> on every <S%H5439>side<s%>.

And the <S%H6607>doors<s%> of the side <S%H6763>chambers<s%> were toward the place that was <S%H3240>left<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6607>door<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north<s%>, and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H6607>door<s%> toward the <S%H1864>south<s%>: and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> that was <S%H3240>left<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

Now the <S%H1146>building<s%> that was <S%H6440>before<s%> the separate <S%H1508>place<s%> at the <S%H6285>end<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H3220>west<s%> was <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%>; and the <S%H7023>wall<s%> of the <S%H1146>building<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>thick<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and the <S%H753>length<s%> there <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>.

So he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>, a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long<s%>; and the separate <S%H1508>place<s%>, and the <S%H1140>building<s%>, with the <S%H7023>walls<s%> <S%H3967>there<s%>, a hundred <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long<s%>;
Also the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and of the separate <S%H1508>place<s%> toward the <S%H6921>east<s%>, a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>.

And he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H1146>building<s%> over <S%H6440>against<s%> the separate <S%H1508>place<s%> which was <S%H310>behind<s%> <S%H862>it<s%>, and the galleries there on the one side and on the other <S%H3967>side<s%>, a hundred <S%H520>cubits<s%>, with the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H1964>temple<s%>, and the <S%H197>porches<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%>;

The door <S%H5592>posts<s%>, and the <S%H331>narrow<s%> <S%H2474>windows<s%>, and the <S%H862>galleries<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> on their three <S%H7969>stories<s%>, over <S%H5048>against<s%> the <S%H5592>door<s%>, made a <S%H7824>ceiling<s%> with <S%H6086>wood<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and from the <S%H776>ground<s%> up to the <S%H2474>windows<s%>, and the <S%H2474>windows<s%> were <S%H3680>covered<s%>;

To that above the <S%H6607>door<s%>, even unto the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H2351>outside<s%>, and by all the <S%H7023>wall<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H6442>inside<s%> and <S%H2435>outside<s%>, by <S%H4060>measure<s%>.

And it was <S%H6213>made<s%> with <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> and palm <S%H8561>trees<s%>, so that a palm <S%H8561>tree<s%> was between a <S%H3742>cherub<s%> and a <S%H3742>cherub<s%>; and every <S%H3742>cherub<s%> had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6440>faces<s%>;

So that the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> was toward the palm <S%H8561>tree<s%> on the one <S%H6440>side<s%>, and the face of a young <S%H3715>lion<s%> toward the palm <S%H8561>tree<s%> on the other <S%H6213>side<s%>: it was made through all the <S%H1004>house<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.
From the <S%H776>ground<s%> unto above the <S%H6607>door<s%> were <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> and palm <S%H8561>trees<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%>, and on the <S%H7023>wall<s%> of the <S%H1964>temple<s%>.

The <S%H4201>posts<s%> of the <S%H1964>temple<s%> were <S%H7251>squared<s%>, and the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>; the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the one as the appearance of the <S%H4758>other<s%>.

The <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H6086>wood<s%> was <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H1364>high<s%>, and the <S%H753>length<s%> there <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>; and the <S%H4740>corners<s%> <S%H753>there<s%>, and the length <S%H7023>there<s%>, and the walls <S%H6086>there<s%>, were of wood: and he <S%H1696>said<s%> unto <S%H7979>me<s%>, This is the table that is <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
And the <S%H1964>temple<s%> and the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1817>doors<s%>.

And the <S%H1817>doors<s%> had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1817>leaves<s%> <S%H8147>apiece<s%>, two <S%H4142>turning<s%> <S%H1817>leaves<s%>; <S%H8147>two<s%> leaves for the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1817>door<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1817>leaves<s%> for the other <S%H312>door<s%>.

And there were <S%H6213>made<s%> on <S%H1817>them<s%>, on the doors of the <S%H1964>temple<s%>, <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> and palm <S%H8561>trees<s%>, like as were <S%H6213>made<s%> upon the <S%H7023>walls<s%>; and there were <S%H5646>thick<s%> <S%H6086>planks<s%> upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H197>porch<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%>.

And there were <S%H331>narrow<s%> <S%H2474>windows<s%> and palm <S%H8561>trees<s%> on the one side and on the other <S%H3802>side<s%>, on the sides of the <S%H197>porch<s%>, and upon the side <S%H6763>chambers<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and thick <S%H5646>planks<s%>.
